name: Outlet
description: Free counseling and support groups for LGBTQ+ youth and families
fullDescription: Outlet provides counseling, support groups, and outreach services for LGBTQ+ youth and their families across San Mateo and Santa Clara counties with locations in Redwood City, Mountain View, and San Mateo.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free youth counseling services
- Support groups for LGBTQ+ youth
- Parent and family support
- School outreach programs
- Adult support groups
- Community education
howToGetIt:
1. Contact Outlet at your nearest location
2. Schedule counseling appointment
3. Join youth or parent support groups
4. Services available for ages 13-25
5. Family members welcome
address: 1229 El Camino Real, Redwood City, CA 94063
keywords: Outlet, San Mateo, Santa Clara, Redwood City, Mountain View, LGBTQ, gay, lesbian, trans, queer, youth counseling, family support, parent support, ages 13-25
